messages.content: You are a helpful assistant.
What do Lone madmen prefer?
The Outer Gods.
You are a helpful assistant.
Where do investigators often encounter worshipers and alien servants?
The remote fastness of the Earth.
You are a helpful assistant.
What can be said about the Great Old Ones' powers?
Supernatural-seeming abilities.
You are a helpful assistant.
Are the Great Old Ones considered true gods?
No, they are not reported to be true gods in the same sense as the Outer Gods.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is said about the Great Old Ones' temporary state?
They seem to be temporarily imprisoned.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is said to happen to the Great Old Ones when the stars are not right?
They cannot live.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is a Great Old One in Lovecraftian mythology?
A Great Old One is a powerful, otherworldly being in Lovecraftian mythology
You are a helpful assistant.
Where does Cthulhu sleep?
At the bottom of the Pacific Ocean
You are a helpful assistant.
What is Ithaqua known for?
Ithaqua the Windwalker roams at will across Earth's arctic latitudes
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the location of Hastur's dwelling?
Near Aldebaran
You are a helpful assistant.
How many Great Old Ones are known on Earth?
All those known on Earth are invoked or worshiped by humans
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the case of minor Great Old Ones like Quachil Uttaus?
They usually have no worshipers
You are a helpful assistant.
What is unique about how Great Old Ones are worshiped by humans?
All those known on Earth are invoked or worshiped by humans but, by the evidence of the stories, Cthulhu is worshiped more than the rest put together.
You are a helpful assistant.
Who is the original designer of the Mythos?
Sandy Petersen
You are a helpful assistant.
What was left out of the Mythos by Sandy Petersen?
The “war in heaven” in which the Great Old Ones battled and were defeated by the Elder Gods.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the significance of the Elder Signs in the Mythos?
Carrying Elder Signs around like crucifixes and holy water and always having the white-hat Elder Gods in the background, ready to save one’s bacon if things get too bad.
You are a helpful assistant.
Why did Sandy Petersen leave out the concept of the Great Old Ones being connected to the Greek elements?
This idea falls apart under close inspection.
You are a helpful assistant.
What was the effect of removing the concept of the Great Old Ones being connected to the Greek elements?
It weakens the premise of the Great Old Ones being monstrous alien beings.
You are a helpful assistant.
What concept was left out of the current edition of Mythos races?
the concept of the various Great Old Ones being connected to the Greek elements of Earth, Water, Fire, and Air
You are a helpful assistant.
Why does the idea of the Great Old Ones being connected to Greek elements weaken their premise?
because it falls apart under close inspection, particularly with Cthulhu being under the sea
You are a helpful assistant.
Why is Cthulhu currently dead?
because he is under the sea
You are a helpful assistant.
What classifications were omitted for the current edition of Mythos races?
Mythos races into the divisions of Servitor and Independent
You are a helpful assistant.
What divisions were intended for Mythos races?
greater and lesser varieties
You are a helpful assistant.
How many Greek elements are mentioned in the text?
4 (Earth, Water, Fire, and Air)
